docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Dinsomon Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Dinsomon Hotel has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Bangkok. Around 0.7 miles from Bangkok National Museum, the property is also 0.8 miles away from Khao San Road and offers free WiFi. The hotel features family rooms.
The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. The hotel features some rooms that have a safety deposit box, and rooms have a private bathroom and a wardrobe. At Dinsomon Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.
Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Wat Saket, Temple of the Emerald Buddha and Grand Palace. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 15.5 miles from Dinsomon Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Methavalai Residence Hotel - SHA Extra Plus! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Situated in the heart of Bangkok Old Town area with a short walk to Democracy Monument and Temple of the Golden Mount, Methavalai Residence Hotel has rooms with free WiFi access. Bangkok City Pillar is a 15-minute walk from the property.
At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom. Methavalai Residence Hotel provides certain rooms with city views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. All units will provide guests with a fridge.
An Asian breakfast is served each morning at the property. A varieties of local food options and Thai restaurants can be found nearby.
Speaking English and Thai, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the reception.
The Grand Palace is a 15-minute drive from this hotel, while Khao San Road can be reached within a 9-minute walk.The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 13 miles from the property.

You're eligible for a Genius discount at Khaosan Palace Hotel - SHA Extra Plus! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Surrounded by historical attractions and entertainment options, Khaosan Palace Hotel offers value-for-money accommodation with a flat-screen cable TV. The hotel boasts a 24-hour front desk and a rooftop swimming pool. Free WiFi is available in all areas.
Khaosan Palace is 0.9 miles from Wat Po Temple and 3.1 miles from Pratunam Market. Suvarnabhumi Airport is 22.4 miles from the hotel.
The classy rooms at the hotel come with modern d√©cor and warm lightings. Each room is fitted with a safety deposit box and minibar. Shower facilities and toiletries are available in the en suite bathroom.
Luggage storage facilities are provided at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel offers currency exchange services while daytrips and sightseeting arrangements can be made at the on-site tour desk. Breakfast is available from 07:00 - 11:00 hrs. at Kappu Kappu Coffee Shop which stays open throughout the day serving refreshments and bakery.
